body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Deathbringer Liege in play
2. Cast a white spell What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The text on the card says "you *may* tap target creature". So I expect to be prompted whether or not I want to. Instead, I'm only prompted to choose a target - there is no way to avoid tapping. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.23 on WinXP
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Deathbringer Liege forces player to tap a creature

comments.body: Ah, never mind. I am in fact prompted whether I want to tap - after I select a target. A bit confusing, but I suppose that's what the rules say should happen.
